players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I noticed that Charlie was found dead last night. I'm worried and want to know if anyone has any information or suspicions about what might have happened."
Bob: "I investigated Alice and found out she's the mafioso. I'm keeping this information to myself for now, but I'll be watching her closely."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
